sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthService} from "../auth.service"; import {User} from "../models/user"; @Component({ selector: 'app-userauth', templateUrl: './user-auth.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-auth.component.css'] }) export class UserAuthComponent { authStatus : boolean = false; constructor(private authService:AuthService){} checkUser(email : string, password : string){ if (this.authService.findUser(email, password)){ alert("correct") this.authStatus=true; } } }
